Detailed Description

A class to wrap various grass functions
Author:
Tim Sutton, Jason Jorgenson

Member Function Documentation

QString LaGrass::runCommand ( QString  theCommand,
QStringList  theArguments,
QString &  theErrorLog 
)

This is the main wrapper function - most others will call it to actually invoke the grass engine.

Parameters:
QString theCommand - a single command name e.g. g.list
QString theArguments - a stringlist of paramters e.g. QStringList myArgs; myArgs << "type=rast" << "type=vect";
&QString theErrorLog - a string passed by reference. On completion, any errors from stderr will have been placed in this string.
Returns:
QString - verbatim output of the command as returned by GRASS. The calling function will be responsible for parsing that output.

QString LaGrass::runCommand ( QString  theCommand,
QStringList  theArguments 
)

Overloaded version of above command that needs no log parameter.

Parameters:
QString theCommand - a single command name e.g. g.list
QString theArguments - a stringlist of paramters e.g. QStringList myArgs; myArgs << "type=rast" << "type=vect";
Returns:
QString - verbatim output of the command as returned by GRASS. The calling function will be responsible for parsing that output.

QStringList LaGrass::getRasterList ( QString  theMapset,
bool  thePrependMapsetFlag = true 
)

Get a list of grass rasters from the PERMANENT and users mapset.

Parameters:
bool thePrependMapsetFlag. Optional paramter which defaults to true. Adds the mapset name in front of each layer e.g. PERMANENT.dem
Returns:
QStringList of layer names.

bool LaGrass::createFrictionMap ( QString  theBaseRaster,
QString  theOututRaster 
)

Create a friction map. All cells in the map will be set to a friction of 1.

Parameters:
QString grass raster layer name for a DEM on which the friction map will be based.
QString output layer name for the friction map (it will be put into the current active mapset)
Returns:
bool - false if the frictionmap creation failed

bool LaGrass::createMask ( QString  theCostSurface,
QString  theMaskRaster 
)

Create a mask map. All cells in the map will be set to either a 1 or null.

Parameters:
QString grass raster layer name for generated cost surface used in analysis.
QString the layer name of the binary raster mask
Returns:
bool - false if the frictionmap creation failed
Note:
generates a raster called tmpMask which will be put into the current active mapset

bool LaGrass::mergeMaps ( QString  theLeftoversGoHere  ) 

Add leftovers from the current mask to the leftovers mask which is available to the animals for grazing

Parameters:
QString grass raster layer name for generated cost surface used in analysis.
QString the layer name of the binary raster mask
Returns:
bool - false if the frictionmap creation failed
Note:
generates a raster called laLeftOverMask which will be put into the current active mapset

void LaGrass::logMessage ( QString  theMessage  ) 

Broadcast to any listeners status messages. This is a convenience function. Internally it will do emit message(QString theMessage) each time it is called.

Parameters:
QString theMessage to be logged.
